1_1E3v8KeMYkrG9sKnbeaEufooqNcicW6N27.body:
amazingly extensive and polished for such a young project.
Great potential, I can think of a number of web services that would benefit greatly from what this makes possible, I can't wait to see what services others will think of for it.
The hard part as always will be explaining to people why it is so important.
